meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brenna McGowan Robert Gonzalez Micah Morken Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4448.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Brenna McGowan, a financial services consultant from Holliston, Massachusetts
Robert Gonzalez, a teacher from Glendora, California
Micah Morken, a graduate student originally from St. Paul, Minnesota (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,200)

tr.td: THE LAWYER WHO...
SPORTS 2003
GUINNESS RECORDS
LIBROS EN ESPAÑOL
BRANDS
BIRD TALK
